member.name: F:MvvmFx.CaliburnMicro.View.GetFirstNonGeneratedView
member.summary: Used to retrieve the root, non-framework-created view.
member.returns: The root element that was not created by the framework.
member.remarks: In certain instances the services create UI elements. For example, if you ask the window manager to show a UserControl as a dialog, it creates a window to host the UserControl in. The WindowManager marks that element as a framework-created element so that it can determine what it created vs. what was intended by the developer. Calling GetFirstNonGeneratedView allows the framework to discover what the original element was.
